adrFormatAddress: 67 Morton St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: Completely regret going for this company for water delivery service. They were very consistent in either delivering me the wrong water order, or not having my delivery at all. Month after month they would apologize and say it would not happen again, only for it to happen again. Now I am trying to cancel the service and discuss getting back my bottle deposit, and they are now claiming I have a large number of bottles, double as much as I ever did. If they couldn't even get my order correct most of the time, I guess I shouldn't be surprised that they would have poor records of my bottle deposit. The owner keeps trying to call me rather than message me via email to prevent a paper trail. I thought I was doing a good thing opting for a small business, but the disorganization makes this service more of a nightmare rather than a convenience. Good luck ever getting your correct order or your bottle deposit back with this company.

originalText.text: Great company to work with. They deliver on time and the water is excellent. A much better company than the large providersâ€¦great customer service.

originalText.text: The best customer service hands down. I donâ€™t have time to be on a phone call so decided to do texting for my order. I am impressed on how fast and easy it was. So excited to finally get rid of all the water bottles I purchase monthly since I only drink alkaline it was getting very expensive. So excited to have it delivered to my door now. Thank you!

originalText.text: The customer service at Tribeca Beverage Company is some of the best I've ever encountered. By phone or by email, they are always incredibly speedy in their responses and always polite and helpful. Deliveries are made on time and communication about arrival is seamless. My only "complaint" is that I live on the 5th floor of a walkup and they almost never bring my water to my door, and many times don't even take my empties. BUT - I've spoken to the company about it and they explained why their drivers often can't do this and since then the drivers have done a good job at getting our empty bottles at least. We are going to move soon anyway, so it doesn't bother me too much. But if you live in a walk up building and are considering doing beverage delivery to help with getting things delivered to your door - just know that this company can't make their drivers deliver anything past the 3rd floor of a walk up. Other than that, I would highly recommend this business. Water is delicious too!!
